about_the_game:
Can a mere mortal defeat a group of giants?

A once-thriving island has been plunged into chaos and destruction. Towering giants known as the "Colossal Counsel", led by the infamous Master Giant, have conquered the land, covering it with hordes of enemies and leaving nothing but ruins in their wake. As a lone swordsman, armed with your blade and unwavering resolve, you are the island’s last hope. Face deadly foes, execute fluid combat combos, and take down towering titans in this action-packed 2D hack-and-slash platformer!

Precision Hack-and-Slash Combat

Master a responsive combat system that rewards skill and timing. Chain together fast-paced sword combos and aerial attacks to cut through your foes with precision. Every enemy encounter is a test of reflexes and strategy!

Explore a Ravaged Island

Venture across a vast fantasy world, from dense forests to ominous castles and colossal battlegrounds where the giants roam. Each area is filled with powerful enemies to defeat and challenges that will push your combat prowess to the limit.

Take Down Towering Titans

The giants that have overtaken the island won’t fall easily. They all possess special powers used to take down anyone who crosses them. Dodge massive attacks, find their weak points, and unleash devastating strikes to bring them crashing down. These larger-than-life battles will test your strength, agility, and determination.

Defeat the Giants, Save the Island

The war against the Colossal Counsel is a battle for survival. Will you reclaim the island, or will you fall beneath the weight of the titans?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD Phenom II X4 965
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0+ compatible GPU
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 14.0 (Sonoma)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or Apple M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Graphics or better
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
